name: Category pages show only correct items, number of results, and user can open Quick view in the page -- @1.4

steps.name: Then Only items of correct category are shown
Then "Showing all N results" is present and reflects correct amount of items
Then Verify all items have Category, Name and Price
Then User can click on Quick View for all items and close it by clicking on closing X
Then User can click on Quick View for all items and add product to cart

fullName: Test Scenarios for Category pages in GetTop: Category pages show only correct items, number of results, and user can open Quick view in the page
